feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add API key to users by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/9
  • Add a list of "share on" buttons to a workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/10
  • Add styling hints for printing by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/11
  • Show the filename at the top with the title by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/12

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.9.1...v0.9.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add API key to users by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/9
  • Add a list of "share on" buttons to a workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/10
  • Add styling hints for printing by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/11
  • Show the filename at the top with the title by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/12
  • Put the graphs for elevation and speed together by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/13
  • fix: when date is missing from metadata, use first track first segment first point's timestamp by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/14
  • Add German translation by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/16
  • Translate the workout types in dropdown selection by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/18
  • Use per-user timezone to show local times by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/19
  • Do not apply altitude correction for files from Workoutdoors (Apple Watch) by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/21
  • fix: format tempo as mm:s (where s is seconds) by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/22
  • fix: nil dereference in social template when address is missing by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/23
  • fix: do not fix altitude for Strava by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/24
  • Move original content of GPX file to separate table by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/26
  • fix: deal correctly with GPX files that have multiple segments and count time between segments as pause time by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/20

New Contributors

  • @pixelspark made their first contribution in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/14

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.9.1...v0.10.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: support skiing, snowboarding, kayaking, swimming workouts by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/27
  • fix: ignore pause between segments for now in stats by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/30

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.10.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove named return values by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/32
  • fix: prevent number and units from being wrapped by @pixelspark in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/31
  • Add FA icons for the new workout types by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/34
  • Remove GPX when removing workout, and fix not null constraint by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/35
  • Fix workout icons, add comments how and why by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/36

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.4

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.10.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add (kind of) support for distance-less GPX and FIT by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/39
  • Add auto-import feature by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/41
  • Render notes as Markdown by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/46

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.10.4...v0.10.5
